name: Shellshock detection
description: Detects strings matching the bash shell code that parses incorrectly in bash, allowing execution of arbitrary commands on the vulnerable machine
content:
env x='() { :;}; echo vulnerable' bash -c "echo this is a test"
 
 curl -A "() { ignored; }; echo Content-Type: text/plain ; echo  ; echo ; /usr/bin/id" http://www.example.com
author: Amor Avhad
